1.「……<pc>さま。| この紅き煙こそ 世界各国の王たちに| 漆黒の闇の訪れをし: ... This crimson smoke is the guide that|will warn the kings of the world of the|coming of the Jet Darkness.

2.「この煙は またたく間に 世界中に広がり| 彼らの目に 触れることでしょう。|: In no time at all, this smoke will spread|around the world and they will see it. And I|remember the lore.

3.「王たちが 一堂に会した時……| 私は 世界の真実を お伝えせねばなりません。|:
When the kings gathered in one place... I|must tell them the truth of the world. The|cruel truth that is etched in the memory of|
|the stars.

4.「ですが それこそが 世告げの姫の主導者たる| 私の使命。この先 何があろうとも:
But that's exactly what I am, the leader of|the Princess of the Annunciation. No matter|what happens in the future, I will fulfill|
|my mission.
